title: What is the most common form of medical imaging? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think today it is in decreasing order of number of times applied: electrical and movement signals, such as heart rate, ECG, EECUltra-soundX-raysoundNMR
Plain radiography. This is when an image is created by directing a beam of radiation through the anatomical area casting a two-dimensional image on a detector.
